item.title: Revolving Condos
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
The revolving restaurant is the pinnacle of civic achievement. I am a sucker for overpriced drinks, terrible appetizers and the line of stationary/rotating demarkation as long as I get a full 360 degrees with never a decent view. But a rotating apartment?

(Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
